snippet: A judge in Oklahoma City said he would rule Thursday morning on whether part or all of a disputed high school football playoff game should be replayed.
abstract: Oklahoma Judge Bernard M Jones II says he will issue ruling on whether part or all of disputed football playoff game between Locust Grove High School and Frederick A Douglass High should be replayed because of blown call affecting game's outcome.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Oklahoma City said he would rule Thursday morning on whether part or all of a disputed high school football playoff game should be replayed.

headline.main: Ruling on High School Replay in Oklahoma Is Delayed
